alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 11:56AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central White Pine and east central Eureka Counties through 1230 PM PDT... At 1155 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Eureka Airport, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm be near Eureka Airport and will cross SR278 near the Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County
